com.thindeck.api

Interface Task

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DyTask, MkTask

    @Immutable
public interface Task
    Task in a Repo.

    Task is a group of work steps that has a number and a name. For example, there could be a "234:deploy" command in a repository. This command simply means that a collection of steps should be executed when it's possible.

    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)
